job_title: Marketing Executive ( IT Solutions and AI Product)
job_description:
Responsibilities: Talent Pro is a subsidiary company of Simura Group that specializes in software development for global clients. We are seeking a skilled and proactive Marketing Executive to help drive the promotion and sales of our IT services and AI-based solutions in the local market. The ideal candidate must have prior experience in marketing and selling similar technology products or services and must possess a strong network of industry contacts that can be leveraged for business growth. This role requires someone sharp, market-aware, and capable of generating leads, converting opportunities, and supporting the company's strategic marketing and sales initiatives. Experience in tender documentation and submission is essential.

Job Responsibilities:
- Promote and market IT solutions and AI product offerings to potential clients in the local market.
- Leverage existing professional relationships and PR networks to generate qualified leads and business opportunities to explore.
- Conduct market research to identify new sectors, clients, and promotional avenues.
- Prepare tenders and submit proposals with required documentation for formal submission standards.
- Create and deliver marketing presentations, product pitches, and promotional content as needed.
- Engage with prospective clients, understand their requirements, and coordinate with internal teams to align solutions.
- Support marketing campaigns, events, digital promotions, and outreach activities.
- Maintain accurate records of marketing activities.
- Achieve defined marketing and business acquisition targets.
- Perform any other tasks assigned by management.

Requirements: тАв Excellent communication, networking, and presentation skills.
тАв Strong understanding of marketing principles, sales funnels, and market positioning.
тАв Ability to work independently, manage priorities, and meet deadlines.
тАв Knowledge of AI, automation tools, and digital transformation trends.
тАв Minimum 3-5 years of experience in marketing or selling IT services or AI-based solutions.
тАв Proven track record of using market PR and professional networks to generate business.
тАв Strong understanding of tender submission processes and documentation standards.

job_description:
Responsibilities: Work according to the directions of management to achieve sales targets. Manage cash counters at the outlet. Provide the best service to customers through proper communication. job_description:
Responsibilities: - Promote Work Visa and Air Ticketing services through various marketing channels.
- Manage online and offline client communications effectively.
- Develop and execute marketing strategies to attract new clients.
- Build and maintain relationships with travel partners and agents.
- Assist customers with inquiries related to visa and ticketing services.
- Achieve monthly marketing and sales targets set by the management.
- Prepare promotional content and support digital campaigns when needed.

- Minimum 1 year of experience in travel agency marketing, ticketing, or visa services.
- Strong knowledge of travel, visa processing, and ticketing systems.
- Excellent communication, negotiation, and client relationship skills.
- Dedicated, target-oriented, and self-motivated; able to work under pressure.
- Proficiency in social media platforms (Facebook, WhatsApp, Instagram) for marketing purposes.
- Basic computer skills (MS Office, Email, Internet browsing).

Assisting in selecting appropriate packages according to customer demands. 4. Informing customers about pre-sales and after-sales services. 5. Transferring membership cards by explaining terms and conditions at each sale.

Requirements: Workplace location (a specific area): Dhaka North: Mohakhali, Mirpur, Dhanmondi, Gulshan, Tejgaon, Badda, Hatirjheel, Basundhara, Farmgate, Shyamoli, Kalyanpur Dhaka South: Jatrabari, Mugda, Sutrapur, Puran Dhaka, Azimpur, Gulistan, Paltan, Motijheel, Sadarghat, Khilgaon, Narayanganj Dhaka Outer: Savar, Manikganj, Narayanganj, Gazipur, Mymensingh Qualifications: HSC or Bachelor's degree, 6 months of sales experience (freshers applicable) Age: 19+ After confirmation Salary and benefits: - Basic: 11,500 - 12,000 BDT - Allowance and commission: 2,600 + 3,000-25,000 BDT - 2 Eid bonuses, increment - Health benefits, telemedicine, life insurance

Responsibilities: Antigua, (Central America, Caribbean Islands) Brief Introduction Antigua and Barbuda (English: Antigua and) is an independent island nation located in the eastern part of the Caribbean Sea. The country consists of three main regions, Antigua, Barbuda, and Redonda, situated in the middle of the Leeward Islands. Compared to other Caribbean countries, Antigua and Barbuda are relatively more economically prosperous. Each year, millions of tourists visit the islands, and the country's economy heavily relies on tourism. It is a safe and legal destination for foreign workers, offering regular salaries, a good working environment, and affordable living expenses for foreign workers. Field: Construction of private villas and condominiums Position: Carpenter Number of Positions: 16 Responsibilities: Constructing and installing wooden doors, windows, frames, and furniture Completing woodwork based on blueprints and designs Cutting, fitting, finishing, and repairing wood Following safety regulations on-site Requirements: Age: 21-40 years Language: Must be able to speak and understand English fluently Candidates must submit a video showcasing their woodworking skills; training and experience certificates in the relevant field must be provided. 3-5 years of practical experience in relevant work is necessary Candidates must be mentally calm, patient, and adaptable, and must have a clean record. Passport must be valid for at least 1 year. Benefits: Salary: USD 1,000 / month; 6 days per week Accommodation: Free; Transportation: Free Food: Self-funded Work Permit: Provided Payment Terms: Payment after obtaining visa Visa processing costs will be relatively low Contract Duration: 12 months; Renewable based on performance. Deadline for File Submission: 06 February, 2026 Delegate Interview: 08 February, 2026 (Online)

Responsibilities: Our global retail team is looking for a friendly, proactive, and responsible **Sales Associate** to work with customers, be knowledgeable about visual merchandising, and capable of taking full responsibility for their designated area. 

Responsibilities

- Greet and assist customers in a friendly and professional manner
- Provide excellent customer service and accurate product information
- Promote linked items and related series to increase sales
- Rearrange and refill displays promptly after sales
- Maintain clean, organized, and attractive product displays
- Assist with product requisition and stock management
- Conduct inventory checks every two weeks and submit reports to the shop manager
- Stay informed about product information and stock updates
- Be vigilant against theft and ensure store security
- Adhere to company dress code and professional code of conduct
- Work 9 hours per day (based on shifts/roster)

Shift Timings:
- 1st Shift: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM
- 2nd Shift: 1:00 PM - 10:00 PM

Location: Ansar Road, Sreepur, Gazipur

Requirements: Good communication skills Customer-focused mentality and proactive behavior Attentive and basic merchandising concepts Ability to work independently and with a team Preference for retail or sales experience (but not necessary) Complimentary lunch provided Sales incentive Two festival bonuses per year Supportive and friendly work environment Opportunity for learning and career growth in retail sales

Responsibilities: Shomvob is looking for a dynamic and responsible Executive тАУ Call Center & Overseas Recruitment to support our international manpower operations. This role is ideal for candidates who can communicate confidently with blue-collar job seekers, manage high call volumes, and support overseas recruitment processes from sourcing to deployment.

тАв Make and receive outbound & inbound calls to potential overseas job candidates
тАв Explain overseas job opportunities, country details, salary, benefits, and recruitment process clearly
тАв Screen candidates based on job requirements (age, experience, skills, medical, documentation)

тАв Handle candidate queries professionally and build trust

тАв Support deployment-related communication until visa issuance

тАв Minimum BachelorтАЩs degree (any discipline preferred)
тАв 1-3 years experience in call center, recruitment, or overseas manpower (preferred)
тАв Strong verbal communication skills in Bangla; basic English communication preferred
тАв Ability to handle pressure and high call volumes
тАв Familiarity with overseas recruitment or blue-collar hiring will be a strong advantage
тАв Basic computer skills (Google Sheets, Excel, CRM or ATS is a plus)
тАв Honest, patient, and candidate-friendly attitude

Job Type & Location
тАв Employment Type: Full-time
тАв Location: Dhaka (Office-based)
тАв Department: Shomvob Manpower / Shomvob Global

Why Join Shomvob
тАв Work with a fast-growing international manpower platform
тАв Exposure to overseas recruitment projects (Middle East, Europe, Asia-Pacific)
тАв Structured recruitment process with long-term growth opportunities
тАв Mission-driven work enabling safe and transparent overseas employment

- Researching psychological motivation and emotional triggers to develop engagement methodologies for diverse team environments.
- Conducting internal audits to maintain high standards for stakeholder collaboration.

Full-time

Dhaka

- Company-sponsored 3 annual programs

Read Before Apply

Go to https://online-voice-recorder.com and record your voice for at least 2-3 minutes with an introduction about yourself, your education, experience, expertise, family, friends, hobbies, etc. The recording must be in English. Save the audio file and send an email to apply@futurecloudbd.com with your resume and the audio recording attached. The voice recording is to verify your English speaking fluency, so do your best in the audio recording.

- Fresh graduates and last-semester students can apply.
- Educational requirements can be relaxed if there is over 1 year of experience in a BPO/international call center.
- Minimum 1 Year experience.

job_description:
Responsibilities: Saudi Arabia, Qatar, Malaysia, Singapore, India, Nepal, and various other countries depend on Ekin Air Travels as a reliable medium for processing tour visas and handling Hajj, Umrah, and air ticketing. Finding new customers and providing clear information about services to them. Delivering travel package and service information to customers and ensuring bookings. Collecting and following up on leads through field or online channels. Maintaining the company's brand image and communicating professionally with customers. Earning commission based on sales. ЁЯТ░ Salary and Benefits: No fixed salary - ЁЯТ╕ Only commission-based income . Monthly travel allowance - 5,000 Taka Attractive commission on sales. Opportunity for long-term work with good performance. Opportunity to build a career in the travel sector.

Requirements: Having experience in marketing or sales work will give you an added advantage. Good communication skills and the ability to influence are necessary. Being interested in field or online marketing is important. Having the mentality to work under pressure is essential. You can also apply for study leave at the university. Prioritize religious candidates for the position.

- Competitive salary with performance-based incentives
- Training and development opportunities

- IT Skills
- Online Presentation

location: Uttara, Anywhere in Dhaka Division, Banasree, Banani, Mohammadpur
job_description:
Responsibilities: Assist in the overall department management to achieve sales targets through regular monitoring, improved customer service, and team motivation. Main Responsibilities Daily Responsibilities Motivate the department team to achieve sales targets. Ensure correct product display, merchandising, and shelf management. Monitor store inventory, product requisition, and customer service and provide feedback to the store in-charge. Participate in store meetings, identify areas for improvement, and plan for sales and operational quality enhancement. Weekly Responsibilities Plan and implement merchandising, product display, and customer service flow to increase sales. Provide weekly feedback to the area manager following store management guidelines. Ensure product availability according to the agreed time with the store in-charge. Maintain shelf maintenance according to the display plan and ensure improved customer service. Monthly Responsibilities Participate in HR training programs and encourage team participation. Ensure compliance with company SOP and stock/inventory management policies. Assist in staff replacement/hiring as needed. Maintain cleanliness, safety, and healthy environment in the store. Assist in stock verification, variance analysis, and expense control. Initiate team development and performance improvement. Annual Responsibilities Follow the Annual Business Plan (ABP) as directed by the area in-charge/manager. Ensure achievement of sales KPI and HR KPI according to company objectives.

Requirements: Minimum Qualifications and Skills Educational Qualification: Minimum SSC Skills: Good verbal communication skills Customer service attitude Proactive and hardworking mentality Experience: No prior experience required (training will be provided) General Responsibilities and Terms Must follow company objectives, policies, and SOPs. May need to take on additional responsibilities and collaborate with other departments as needed. Must be adaptable to changes in any unit/branch as per management decisions. Must maintain professional conduct and uphold the company's image at all times. Permanent employees must provide a 60-day notice before resigning. Behavioral Expectations Maintain a professional image and attitude in line with the company's values. Show respectful behavior towards colleagues and customers. company_address: Bagdad Tanjia Tower (3rd Floor), Chandona Chowrasta, Tangail Road, Gazipur-1702
job_description:
Responsibilities: We are looking for sincere caregivers, nurses, and attendants to provide genuine care and supervision for adult patients, bedridden individuals, and young children in various areas of Dhaka.

Your main responsibilities include:
тЬЕ Service and Care: Maintaining physical hygiene of patients (e.g. bathing, changing clothes, trimming nails, etc.).
тЬЕ Medical Support: Administering medication on time, providing insulin, and checking blood pressure/diabetes.
тЬЕ Assistance in Mobility: Helping patients move from bed to wheelchair or providing support for walking.
тЬЕ Monitoring: Informing the office or doctor about any improvements or deteriorations in the patient's physical condition.

ЁЯМЯ Special Opportunity (for newcomers)
Are you interested in this job but have never done it before? No worries!
- Freshers Welcome: No prior experience needed for this job. We provide training for newcomers. (Training facilities available)
- Training and Job: Those who are inexperienced will be trained at our own institution, 'Sara Technical Institute', and directly placed in a job.
- Career Development: It's not just a job, but a great opportunity to excel in the nursing and caregiving sector.

Work Hours and Type:
- Must be mentally prepared to work 12 or 24-hour shifts (arrangements for staying and eating available for 24-hour shifts).

Requirements: Behavior and Mentality: Must be extremely patient, calm, and humble in nature. (As it is required to take care of sick patients and children). Should have a mentality to care for elderly or young children as one's own family. Should be honest and punctual in work. Other Qualifications: Prescribe and administer medication to patients. Must have a National ID card or birth registration certificate. Must be mentally prepared to work in shifts of 12 or 24 hours.

job_description:
Responsibilities: Responsibilities:
- Contact a specified number of potential customers daily via phone.
- Provide clear and accurate information about IFixFast products, services, and current offers to customers.
- Understand customer needs, suggest appropriate services, and assist in ensuring service bookings.
- Regularly update customer sheets with their needs, interests, and feedback.
- Handle incoming calls and customer queries with skill.
- Resolve customer complaints or issues promptly and follow up with the relevant team if necessary.
- Actively work towards achieving set Sales Targets and Performance Goals.
- Prepare and update reports as per Team Leader/Manager's instructions.
- Maintain customer satisfaction and build long-term relationships.
- Coordinate with other team members to fulfill responsibilities.
- Be punctual, attentive, and disciplined at the workplace.

Requirements: Qualifications: Minimum HSC Pass (Preference will be given to Honors completed or ongoing students) Experience in Telesales/Customer Service will be preferred Ability to communicate clearly, confidently, and politely with customers Basic computer operation , proficiency in Google Sheets and data management Typing proficiency required (Minimum 15-20 words per minute in Bengali typing) Mentality to work target-oriented and ability to work under pressure Must be responsible, hardworking, and eager to learn ЁЯТ░ Salary and Benefits: Basic Salary: 12,000 - 25,000 BDT (Based on experience and performance) Commission and Incentives: Performance-based commission at the end of probation period Opportunity to earn monthly 25,000 BDT or more with good performance Festival Bonus: 2 Eid bonuses per year (Minimum 1 year of service required) Annual Salary Increment (Based on performance) Opportunity for quick promotion Training Provided (Necessary training will be provided) Promotion and career growth opportunities Skill Development Program Friendly and supportive work environment тП░ Work Schedule: Time: 10:00 AM - 7:00 PM Working Days: 6 days per week Leave: Roster-based

Responsibilities: Responsibilities & Context
Company Overview
YAMAAN is a modern fashion and lifestyle brand focused on premium quality, contemporary design, and delivering an exceptional customer experience. The brand operates through its own retail outlets and online platforms and maintains a strong, professional brand voice in all customer communications.
Job Responsibilities
- Respond to customer messages on Facebook, Instagram, WhatsApp, and website live chat (English only)
- Call customers
- Provide accurate information regarding products, pricing, sizing, availability, and delivery
- Confirm orders and complete the delivery process
- Maintain a polite, professional, and brand-consistent tone in all communications
- Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and follow-ups efficiently
- Coordinate with sales and operations teams when necessary
- Maintain records of customer interactions when required
Skills & Expertise
- Call Center Operations
- Customer Communication
- Fluent Communication in English

job_description:
Responsibilities: We are looking for a Junior Sales and Customer Support Executive to join our furniture showroom team. The ideal candidate will provide excellent customer service, answer customer inquiries, handle complaints, and ensure a seamless shopping experience.

Responsibilities:
- Welcome customers to the showroom and assist with product selection
- Provide detailed information about furniture accessories, design, and pricing
- Respond to customer inquiries and concerns directly, over the phone, or via email
- Process orders, track delivery progress, and ensure post-sales services
- Coordinate with sales and logistics teams to facilitate transactions
- Handle customer complaints professionally and strive for quick resolutions
- Maintain customer records and feedback for service improvement
- Assist in showroom operations, including keeping the showroom clean and organized

**Extra hours will be compensated separately**

**Salary:** 15,000 BDT

**KPI Bonus:** Based on monthly sales and performance (unlimited)

**Work Location:** Uttara House Building

**Training Location:** Panthapath

Requirements: Completed BBA or MBA (preferable) Good communication skills Interested in professional behavior and sales/customer service

Job Description: We are seeking a dedicated and experienced Site Engineer - Civil to oversee construction projects, ensure quality standards, and coordinate with various teams on-site. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in civil engineering, excellent problem-solving skills, and the ability to manage multiple tasks efficiently.

Requirements: Key Responsibilities:
- Managing parts of construction projects.
- Overseeing construction work.
- Undertaking surveys.
- Setting out sites.
- Checking technical designs and drawings for accuracy and to ensure that they are followed correctly.
- Supervising contracted staff.
- Ensure project packages meet the agreed specifications, budgets, and timescales.

Requirements:
- Education: B.Sc in Civil Engineering or related field.
- Experience: At least 5 years. The applicants should have experience in the following business area(s): Resort.
- Additional Requirements: Age 25 to 35 years. Proven experience as a Site Engineer or similar role in civil construction. Knowledge of construction methods, safety regulations, and quality standards. Strong communication and leadership skills. Ability to work under pressure and meet deadlines.

Responsibilities: - Edit and assemble raw footage into polished videos that communicate clear stories and meet campaign objectives.
- Utilize advanced CapCut skills to create engaging short-form and long-form content tailored for social media platforms.
- Employ Adobe Premiere Pro, After Effects, and other tools to incorporate motion graphics and visual effects as necessary.
- Implement color correction and grading to maintain a consistent, professional appearance across all outputs.
- Mix and balance audio, add sound effects, and ensure clear dialogue and music levels for an immersive viewer experience.
- Generate accurate subtitles and captions to enhance accessibility and viewer engagement.
- Develop transitions, lower thirds, and on-screen graphics that enhance storytelling while adhering to brand guidelines.
- Collaborate closely with marketing and content teams to generate ideas, incorporate feedback, and align videos with campaign objectives.
- Organize, tag, and manage a structured asset library with reliable backups and version control.
- Prioritize tasks and effectively manage time to deliver high-quality videos within tight deadlines.
- Maintain brand consistency and cohesive storytelling across all video content and formats.
- Create and maintain an impressive demo reel showcasing technical skills, creative versatility, and successful projects.

Requirements: Proficient use of CapCut for advanced short-form and social-first editing, including multi-track timelines, speed ramping, smart transitions, and template customization.

Advanced proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro: timeline editing, multicam workflows, native format handling, proxies, sequence nesting, and export optimization for multiple platforms.

Strong skills in Adobe After Effects for motion graphics, keyframing, compositing, green-screen keying, 2D/3D text animation, and visual effects integration with Premiere Pro.

Familiarity with complementary tools and plugins (audio restoration tools, color grading panels, LUT workflows, and motion-graphics templates) to enhance production value.

Ability to shape narrative and pacing: craft coherent stories from raw footage; choose compelling shots, and structure edits to meet campaign objectives and audience intent.

Experience producing both short-form (reels, TikTok, Shorts) and long-form content (web, broadcast, branded long-form) with platform-specific framing, captioning, and pacing strategies.

Design and implement creative transitions, lower thirds, bumpers, and on-screen graphics that support messaging while aligning with brand guidelines.

Deliver polished motion-graphics sequences and animated elements that elevate storytelling without distracting from the core message.

Edit and assemble raw footage into polished videos that communicate clear stories and meet campaign objectives. Leverage pro-level CapCut expertise to craft engaging short-form and long-form content optimized for social platforms. Use Adobe Premiere Pro,

Responsibilities: ```html Maintain friendly and professional behavior with customers, understand their needs, and provide appropriate product recommendations. Actively work towards achieving set individual and team-based sales targets and regularly exceed them. Maintain long-term and positive relationships through customer inquiries and follow-ups to ensure customer satisfaction. Provide product demonstrations and explain product features and benefits in an easy and customer-friendly language. Present relevant products or services to customers by highlighting upselling and cross-selling opportunities. Keep product information and knowledge updated and assist customers in making informed decisions. Gather customer feedback and responses to inform the relevant department for product, service, and overall customer experience improvement. ```

Requirements: Understanding customer needs and providing friendly and professional customer service, as well as offering appropriate products or solutions. Presenting product features and benefits in a simple, understandable, and customer-centric manner through effective product demonstrations. Highlighting upselling and cross-selling opportunities during customer communication to present relevant additional or complementary products. Maintaining long-term customer relationships through timely follow-ups, active communication, and post-sales support. Gathering customer feedback and market-related information to provide reports to the relevant team for product, service, and overall customer experience improvement. Collaborating with colleagues to work towards team goals, share leads, and exchange effective skills and best practices.

Responsibilities: ```html Supervise and oversee the end-to-end quality control process to ensure consistent adherence to company standards. Conduct regular inspections at production sites and retail locations, performing sample checks and final product verification. Apply quality inspection tools and standard operating procedures to identify defects and maintain product consistency. Lead root-cause analysis for quality issues and coordinate corrective actions with production and sourcing teams. Train, mentor, and guide QC team members to strengthen inspection skills and promote best practices. Document inspection findings clearly and prepare timely reports for management review and decision-making. Communicate effectively with suppliers, production staff, and retail partners to resolve quality concerns promptly. Recommend process improvements and preventive measures to reduce defects and enhance product reliability. Maintain and calibrate inspection tools and ensure compliance with SOPs and safety requirements. Manage QC records and documentation to support traceability and audit readiness. Travel for field inspections as required, representing the company professionally and ensuring consistent quality across locations. Support continuous improvement initiatives by sharing feedback and contributing to quality-focused projects. ```

Requirements: Key responsibilities
- Define and maintain factory quality standards aligned with buyer requirements and internal policies.
- Develop, implement, and update standard operating procedures (SOPs) for production and preparatory processes to ensure right-first-time quality.
- Design and operate a Management Information System (MIS) for capturing quality metrics, trends, and nonconformance records.
- Perform routine and sample inspections across production stages; verify final product quality before dispatch.
- Lead root-cause analysis and corrective/preventive action (CAPA) processes to resolve recurring defects.
- Train, coach, and onboard new quality personnel on company quality policies, inspection techniques, and quality tools.
- Coordinate with production, sourcing, and supplier teams to ensure quality requirements are understood and met.
- Maintain inspection instruments, and ensure calibration schedules are followed and documented.
- Prepare clear, timely inspection reports and communicate findings to relevant stakeholders for decision-making.
- Support internal and external audits and maintain traceable quality documentation for audit readiness.

company_address: Plot No: 79, Road No: 10B, Uttara, Dhaka
job_description:
Responsibilities: Managing inventory, overseeing store operations, and ensuring all store activities such as receiving, storing, and dispatching materials. Maintaining accurate inventory records through stock checks and reconciliations and preparing reports on stock levels and transactions. Receiving incoming materials and verifying quantity and quality against purchase orders and delivery challans. Maintaining accurate records of stock (raw materials, finished goods, accessories, and trims). Updating stock levels in ERP/software or manual stock registers. Storing materials in a clean, organized, and safe environment. Segregating shipment products that are processed for delivery or tracking inward and outward movement of goods. Keeping track of returnable products (e.g. unused trims, accessories, and raw materials). Preparing daily/weekly/monthly stock reports as well as monitoring shortages of products. Ensuring the security and safety of inventories to prevent damages effectively.

Responsibilities: 1. Brand Promotion & Awareness
- Promote SKRP products to retailers, electricians, and end customers.
- Communicate product features, benefits, and usage effectively.
- Support marketing campaigns, roadshows, and in-market activation programs.

2. Merchandising & Display
- Ensure all products are properly displayed and branded at retail points.
- Place promotional materials (banners, posters, danglers, etc.) in assigned outlets.
- Regularly check visibility and replace damaged or outdated materials.

3. Market Visit & Support
- Visit outlets daily as per route plan and maintain strong relationships with shop owners.
- Assist the Sales Executive in collecting orders (memos) from retailers.
- Identify new outlets for product placement and promotion.

4. Feedback & Reporting
- Collect feedback from retailers, electricians, and customers about products and competitors.
- Report daily market activities, feedback, and promotional performance to the TSM/RSM.
- Share photos or records of display, branding, and campaign participation.

5. Event & Campaign Support
- Participate in trade shows, fairs, dealer meetings, and promotional events.
- Coordinate with marketing team for special campaigns and seasonal offers.
- Represent the brand positively and maintain professional appearance and behavior.

- Good communication and presentation skills.
- Confident, energetic, and brand-oriented mindset.
- Ability to engage with retailers and customers effectively.
- Willing to work in the field and travel frequently.

- Positive attitude, strong work ethic, and attention to detail.
- Problem-solving skills and a customer-centric approach.

Responsibilities: тЬ│я╕П Job Summary
The General Manager will be responsible for the overall management, operational control, compliance, financial oversight, and business growth of the company's three mobile retail shops dealing with imported mobile phone sets. The role requires strong leadership, integrity, discipline, and experience in administration and governance.

ЁЯЫД Key Roles & Responsibilities
тЬЕ Business Growth & Planning
- Develop detailed strategies, action plans, and timelines to increase the company's products and services and expand business operations.
- Identify opportunities for business improvement, operational efficiency, and sustainable growth.

тЬЕ Operations & Team Management
- Oversee daily operations of all three mobile shops and ensure smooth workflow.
- Lead, manage, and supervise shop managers and staff, ensuring discipline, coordination, and performance improvement.
- Conduct regular shop visits and performance evaluations.

тЬЕ Customer Care & Service Excellence
- Ensure high-quality customer care services across all outlets.
- Maintain strong relationships with customers and resolve major complaints or disputes professionally.

тЬЕ Inventory & Asset Control
- Monitor inward and outward movement of mobile phones and accessories.
- Ensure proper documentation, IMEI records, stock registers, and prevention of stock loss or misuse.
- Verify inventory reports and ensure transparency in stock management.

тЬЕ Financial Oversight & Confidentiality
- Oversee all financial transactions of the company, including sales, expenses, cash handling, and bank deposits.
- Supervise loan disbursement and recovery (if applicable) in accordance with company policies.
- Maintain strict confidentiality of all financial transactions, records, and sensitive company information.

тЬЕ Compliance & Governance
- Ensure compliance with government regulations, customs documentation, VAT, tax, and company policies.
- Maintain proper records to support audits, inspections, and regulatory requirements.

тЬЕ Staff & Customer Welfare
- Ensure customers and office staff receive all benefits, facilities, and entitlements as per company rules and policies.
- Promote ethical practices, fairness, and professionalism within the organization.

тЬЕ Reporting & Coordination
- Prepare and submit regular operational and financial reports to ownership/management.
- Coordinate closely with accounts, operations, suppliers, and other stakeholders.
- Report risks, irregularities, or operational issues promptly with recommendations for corrective action.

Preferred Candidate Profile
Age: 25-65 years
Background: Retired Army / Defense / Banker / College or University Teacher / Government Service
Strong leadership, integrity, administrative experience, and decision-making ability

Requirements: тЬЕ Required Documents Updated CV / Resume Recent passport-size photograph Photocopies of educational certificates Photocopy of National ID (NID) тЬЕ Required Qualifications & Skills Masters or equivalen

Responsibilities: - Oversee all branch operations to ensure smooth daily functioning, timely problem resolution, and consistent service delivery.
- Drive sales growth through targeted marketing initiatives, customer engagement programs, and local outreach activities.
- Develop and execute plans to strengthen brand visibility and increase market share within the local community.
- Recruit, coach, and mentor staff to build a high-performing, customer-focused team while promoting continuous development.
- Set clear performance targets to optimize sales, service, and operational results.
- Maintain excellent customer satisfaction by instilling a culture of responsiveness, quality service, and effective complaint resolution.
- Manage budgets, control costs, and oversee inventory and resource allocation to maximize branch profitability.
- Ensure compliance with company policies, regulatory requirements, and risk-management procedures to protect assets and reputation.
- Implement process improvements and best practices that enhance efficiency, reduce waste, and improve the customer experience.
- Prepare regular operational and performance reports for senior management and propose actionable recommendations.

Requirements: Core competencies
- Demonstrated domain expertise in clothing/fashion retail with hands-on knowledge of both front-of-house (sales floor, customer interaction, visual presentation) and back-of-house activities (receiving, stockroom management, tagging, and pricing).
- Strong branch operations capability: manage opening/closing procedures, daily workflow coordination, staff handovers, and timely escalation of operational issues to protect service continuity.
- Proven leadership and team-building skills: recruit, onboard, coach, motivate, and, where necessary, apply fair disciplinary measures to maintain a high-performing, customer-focused team.
- Customer service orientation with demonstrated ability to resolve escalated complaints, restore customer trust, and turn service recovery into repeat business.
- Commercial mindset: consistently identify and act on local sales opportunities (in-store promotions, events, and targeted customer outreach) to grow footfall and average transaction value.
- Decisive problem-solver who diagnoses operational issues quickly, prioritizes actions, and implements practical solutions under time constraints.

Technical and operational skills
- Point of sale (POS) and retail systems proficiency: operate and train others on POS platforms, inventory management modules, and basic CRM tools; comfortable troubleshooting common POS issues and performing end-of-day reconciliations.
- Inventory management and stock control: run cycle counts, execute stock reconciliations, investigate and reduce shrinkage, manage inbound/outbound shipments, and maintain accurate stock records to prevent stockouts and overstocks.

Responsibilities: Supervisors must provide full assistance to achieve departmental sales targets. Provide complete service to customers through communication with them. Ensure highest level of customer satisfaction through customer service. Arrange and display products according to the planogram. Ensure correct packaging and delivery according to standard operating procedures. Adhere to cleanliness and hygiene regulations in the workplace. Inventory of free products must be done and products must be provided to customers based on offers and promotions. Follow the rules and regulations of Queue Management System directed by the Line Manager. Regularly check expiration dates of products and report to the Line Manager. Maintain cleanliness and hygiene of shelves, workstations, and customer service areas. Assist in receiving, loading, unloading, and shelving products from the warehouse and suppliers.

Requirements: Duty Hours: 8 hours duty (Friday and Saturday - 12 hours duty) Roster duty based on shifts. Morning shift: 8 am to 4 pm, Evening shift: 2 pm to 10 pm As per outlet manager's instructions, work on any day and any shift. Weekly off: 1 day (except Friday and Saturday based on roster) Only interested candidates are requested to come for direct interview at Agora Super Shop outlets in Uttara, Gulshan, Mohammadpur, Banasree, Indira Road, Green Road, Aftabnagar, Segunbagicha, Dhanmondi, Moghbazar. Interview Day and Time: Every Sunday at 3 pm Direct Interview Address: Agora Head Office, MBON Complex (Lift-7), 99, Mohakhali, Dhaka (Near Amtoli Square, next to Ban Bhaban) Be sure to bring your CV and national ID card or birth registration copy for the direct interview at the mentioned address.

Responsibilities: Handle inbound calls and messages with a friendly, professional tone, ensuring customers feel heard and supported.

Conduct targeted outbound calls to follow up on leads, confirm orders, and encourage repeat purchases.

Respond promptly to customer queries across phone, Facebook Messenger, and website chat, tailoring solutions to individual needs.

Accurately update and maintain customer records in the CRM, logging interactions, outcomes, and agreed next steps.

Communicate clearly and courteously, adopting a solution-focused approach to resolve issues and build customer trust.

Recommend relevant products and promotions during conversations to help customers find the best fit.

Monitor call outcomes, lead status, and conversion metrics to identify opportunities for improvement.

Collaborate closely with fulfillment, support, and marketing teams to ensure smooth order processing and consistent customer experiences.

Stay up to date on product details, promotions, and policy changes to provide accurate information and confident recommendations.

Share regular feedback on customer trends and process improvements to enhance service quality and sales performance.

Active listening and empathyтАФaccurately identify customer needs, confirm understanding, and respond with appropriate solutions or escalation steps.

Persuasive conversational skillsтАФgently guide customers toward useful products or actions without being pushy; use probing questions to uncover opportunities.

Problem solving with a solution-focused mindsetтАФevaluate issues quickly, propose practical options, and follow through until the customer is satisfied.

Time management and prioritizationтАФhandle multiple inquiries across channels while meeting SLAs and follow-up commitments.

job_description:
Responsibilities: We are searching for a proactive and detail-oriented HR Officer who will be responsible for carrying out day-to-day HR operations, ensuring smooth hiring processes, and managing employees across IFixFast and its sister concern, Amdox Operation. The ideal candidate should possess strong communication skills, organizational abilities, and a solid understanding of HR practices.

Key Responsibilities:
- Manage end-to-end recruitment: job posting, screening, shortlisting, interviewing, and onboarding.
- Maintain accurate employee records, attendance, and HR documentation.
- Support daily HR operational tasks and ensure timely execution of all HR activities.
- Coordinate and manage employees working under IFixFast and Amdox Operation.
- Assist in implementing HR policies, procedures, and compliance requirements.
- Handle employee queries, provide grievance support, and maintain a positive workplace environment.
- Monitor training sessions, performance updates, and staff development activities.
- Prepare HR reports and provide HR-related insights to management.
- Ensure smooth coordination between both companies for operational HR needs.

Employment Details:
Job Location: IFixFast & Amdox Operation
Working Hours: As per company policy
Salary: Negotiable (based on experience)
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities: Earn up to 20,000 taka by joining as a Foodpanda rider New riders in Dhaka can get joining bonus up to 1,500 taka* Motorbike: 1,500 taka Cycle: 1,500 taka On foot: 1,500 taka Attractive benefits you will receive: Weekly quest bonus, surge fee bonus, new rider bonus, and extra earning opportunities. Also, attractive rider tips and referral program for friends. Flexible working hours, location, and weekly payment. You can set your own working hours in your preferred zone and receive your earned money at the end of the week (every Monday). Loyalty points and deals: Enjoy discount deals using loyalty points received on every delivery (1 point = 1 order). Benefit from discount deals from partners like Duronto Cycle, RFL (Home Appliances), Janix (Health Services), and more. Requirements for application: Must have an Android phone Rider with a cycle, scooter, motorbike, or on foot National ID card Must be 18+ Job Type Full-time Working Hours 9 hours Shift Day shift

Responsibilities: *Job Title:* Business Development Executive

*Company Name:* Carnival Mart

*Location:* Own district

*Job Type:* Part-time

*Working Hours:* 4 hours daily (flexible)

*Salary:* Fixed - 8,000 BDT/month

*Other Benefits:*
- Part-time executives will not be provided any additional TA/DA. Based on performance, dedication to work, not deviating from rules and regulations, besides the basic salary, a daily allowance of 200 BDT will be provided, in that case, the monthly salary for part-time executives with TA/DA is fixed at 13,200 BDT. Opportunity to become a full-time executive is available. In that case, promotion and TA/DA will be provided according to the company's specified rules.

*Job Summary:*
We are looking to hire proactive and self-motivated individuals for the position of Business Development Executive. The job will involve field-level marketing, building and maintaining relationships with clients, and promoting the company's products and services - "without any sales targets". Candidates are free to work independently for any 4 hours a day.

*Key Responsibilities:*
- Presenting company products to potential clients/organizations
- Establishing and maintaining professional client relationships
- Monitoring market conditions and providing feedback reports
- Documenting reports and activities according to company policies

*Qualifications:*
- Educational Qualification: Minimum HSC; Graduates will be preferred
- Both freshers and experienced candidates can apply
- Must have good communication and comprehension skills
- Must be confident, punctual, and professional
- Proficiency in smartphone usage and reporting is necessary

*Additional Information:*
- Fixed Salary: 8,000 BDT/month
- TA/DA will not be provided
- Training will be provided
- Evaluation based on performance
- Opportunity for promotion to full-time position in the future.

Requirements: Fluent, quick-witted, and socially minded

job_description:
Responsibilities: Before applying, make sure to read the complete post,
Our main goal at HealthOS company is to deliver our products to our esteemed customers with great care.
Job Description,
1. Understand the products correctly according to the invoice from the supervisor
2. After understanding the product correctly, arrange the product in the designated place
3. After the product is ordered, package the correct product by checking the invoice
Work hours:
Morning Shift: From 2 pm to 11 pm.
Educational qualification from at least JSC to SSC, primarily the main goal is to be able to package the product by understanding the name of the product.

Requirements: The location of the workplace is the fourth floor of the Prime Bank building, a little ahead of Adabar Police Station, Baiytul Aman Tower.

Responsibilities: Company Overview: Wellspring Bangladesh Ltd. is the Bangladesh arm of Wellspring Global Pte Ltd, a Singapore-based consumer healthcare company. Our mission is to make essential wellness solutionsтАФparticularly safe drinking water and fortified nutrition productsтАФaccessible and affordable to underserved and mass-affluent populations in Bangladesh. All our efforts are aligned with key UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), focusing on public health, nutrition, and clean water. Position Overview: The TSM will lead the Territory sales operations, ensuring optimal market penetration, distributor/channel development, retail execution, and team leadership. This is a strategic role crucial to scaling revenue, expanding distribution, and building visibility for WellspringтАЩs product portfolio. Key Responsibilities: 1. Drive territory sales targets and execute the business plan. 2. Manage distributors, channels, stock, and secondary sales. 3. Ensure strong retail execution, visibility, and new outlet activation. 4. Lead, coach, and monitor field sales teams for productivity. 5. Expand market coverage and support regional activations. 6. Prepare sales, market, and competitor performance reports. 7. Ensure compliance, credit control, and risk management. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): тАв Target vs. Achievement (Revenue, Volume, Coverage) тАв Numeric and Weighted Distribution Growth тАв Active Outlet Count and New Outlet Activation тАв Sales Team Productivity (Call Rate, Order Strike Rate, Outlet Coverage) тАв Distributor ROI and Claim Processing Turnaround тАв Market Expansion Metrics (new sub-area/channel coverage) тАв Competitor Intelligence & Reporting Frequency Qualifications: тАв BachelorтАЩs degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or relevant field. тАв 2тАУ5 years of experience in sales management roles within the FMCG or Consumer Healthcare sector. тАв Proven success in managing distributors and building retail sales operations. тАв Strong leadership, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. тАв Tech-savvy with experience in using sales automation/CRM tools and Excel-based dashboards. тАв Willingness to travel extensively within the assigned region. Benefits: тАв Competitive salary and incentive structure тАв Travel allowance, mobile allowance, and performance bonuses тАв Opportunity to work with a purpose-driven and innovation-led organization тАв Fast-track career development and leadership grooming

job_description:
Responsibilities: Welcome tourists warmly and provide assistance throughout the trip Provide accurate information about tourist attractions, history, culture, and local traditions Plan and execute tours according to the designated itinerary Ensure the safety, cleanliness, and satisfaction of tourists during the trip Coordinate with transportation, hotels, restaurants, and local service providers Implement the tour itinerary efficiently through time management Handle tourists' questions, special requests, and complaints respectfully Provide guidance on local rules, language, and travel-related advice Maintain group discipline and ensure adherence to tour guidelines Provide necessary assistance and primary medical care in emergency situations Collect feedback from tourists to improve service quality

Responsibilities: Company Overview: Wellspring Bangladesh Ltd. is the Bangladesh arm of Wellspring Global Pte Ltd, a Singapore-based consumer healthcare company. Our mission is to make essential wellness solutionsтАФparticularly safe drinking water and fortified nutrition productsтАФaccessible and affordable to underserved and mass-affluent populations in Bangladesh. All our efforts are aligned with key UN Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs), focusing on public health, nutrition, and clean water. Position Overview: The TSM will lead the Territory sales operations, ensuring optimal market penetration, distributor/channel development, retail execution, and team leadership. This is a strategic role crucial to scaling revenue, expanding distribution, and building visibility for WellspringтАЩs product portfolio. Key Responsibilities: 1. Drive territory sales targets and execute the business plan. 2. Manage distributors, channels, stock, and secondary sales. 3. Ensure strong retail execution, visibility, and new outlet activation. 4. Lead, coach, and monitor field sales teams for productivity. 5. Expand market coverage and support regional activations. 6. Prepare sales, market, and competitor performance reports. 7. Ensure compliance, credit control, and risk management. Key Performance Indicators (KPIs): тАв Target vs. Achievement (Revenue, Volume, Coverage) тАв Numeric and Weighted Distribution Growth тАв Active Outlet Count and New Outlet Activation тАв Sales Team Productivity (Call Rate, Order Strike Rate, Outlet Coverage) тАв Distributor ROI and Claim Processing Turnaround тАв Market Expansion Metrics (new sub-area/channel coverage) тАв Competitor Intelligence & Reporting Frequency Qualifications: тАв BachelorтАЩs degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or relevant field. тАв 2тАУ5 years of experience in sales management roles within the FMCG or Consumer Healthcare sector. тАв Proven success in managing distributors and building retail sales operations. тАв Strong leadership, negotiation, and interpersonal skills. тАв Tech-savvy with experience in using sales automation/CRM tools and Excel-based dashboards. тАв Willingness to travel extensively within the assigned region. Benefits: тАв Competitive salary and incentive structure тАв Travel allowance, mobile allowance, and performance bonuses тАв Opportunity to work with a purpose-driven and innovation-led organization тАв Fast-track career development and leadership grooming

job_description:
Responsibilities: Serve as the primary point of contact for students and maintain strong, professional relationships

Understand students' academic and career goals and provide accurate guidance accordingly

Prepare, review, and verify admission and visa-related documents with attention to detail

Track and manage student file timelines for admission and visa processing

Ensure timely follow-ups and smooth coordination to meet client expectations

Arrange and coordinate meetings between students, clients, and internal teams

Provide regular status updates and reports to management

Address student queries, concerns, and complaints in a timely and professional manner

Escalate complex or sensitive issues to senior management when required

Conduct in-depth research on student visa requirements, eligibility criteria, and documentation checklists

Requirements: - BachelorтАЩs degree in any discipline from a recognized institution
- 1-2 years of relevant experience in research, documentation, student services, or education consultancy (Fresh graduates with strong skills and willingness to learn may also apply)
- Basic understanding of international student admission and visa processes will be an advantage
- Excellent written and verbal communication skills in English (Bangla proficiency required)
- Strong documentation, drafting, and proofreading skills
- Good research and analytical abilities with attention to detail
- Ability to manage multiple student files and meet deadlines effectively
- Proficient in MS Office and Google Workspace (Word, Excel, Docs, Sheets, Email)
- Strong interpersonal and relationship management skills
- Customer-oriented, responsible, and professional work attitude
- Ability to work independently as well as collaboratively within a team

Are you detail-oriented, fluent in English, and looking for a flexible online job? Join our team as a Data Annotator for Taobao, one of the worldтАЩs leading e-commerce platforms!

As a Data Annotator, your main task will be to review and verify product information on Taobao's work platform. You will:

ЁЯТ░ Salary Details:

Up to 15000 BDT - 25,000 BDT depending on your English proficiency level, related work experiences, degree etc.

job_description:
Responsibilities: Are you hardworking, ambitious, and want to establish yourself in life through honest means?

If so, there is a golden opportunity for you to work as a Financial Associate at MetLife, a leading American financial organization in Bangladesh for over 70 years.

Join now and become a representative of MetLife, contribute to society/country, and fulfill your dreams.

Position: 'Financial Associate'

Job Description: As a Financial Associate, you can brighten your future and contribute to a great cause by working at 'H.K. Khan Agency' with MetLife in Bangladesh.

Why become a Financial Associate at MetLife?

- Opportunity for rapid career advancement through your hard work and skills
- Financial Associate ----> Unit Manager ----> Branch Manager

Financial Benefits:

1. Quick start to earnings after joining
2. Annual average income of 40 lakhs for the top 50 performers
3. Annual average income of 20 lakhs for the top 100 performers, along with other bonuses
4. Special recognition and rewards for exceptional performance

Opportunities for Dream Fulfillment:

1. International and domestic travel
2. Recognition at international conferences
3. Medical coverage for family
4. Provident fund
5. Scholarships for children's education

Chances of Quick Success:

1. World-class training facilities
2. Skilled trainers
3. Digital workspace
4. 100% online-based programs
5. Digital tools for sales and activity management

Opportunity for Personal Business:

1. Opportunity to start your own business without any investment
2. Rapid promotion based on performance to become a Unit Manager and later a Branch Manager
3. Opportunity to start an agency in your name
4. Work flexibility according to your convenience

Responsibilities: Assist millions of people in the country by providing health and financial security, establish and maintain relationships with clients to achieve business goals.

Work Flexibility: Part-time and full-time job opportunities.

Contact:
'H.K. Khan Agency'
MetLife, Bangladesh

Address: B I S T Bhaban, 5th Floor, Holding # 122/A, Kakrail Road, Dhaka-1000 (Near Habibullah Bahar College)

Phone Number: 01715564488

"If you are ready to take on challenges and want to tread the path of a successful career, then apply today to join this dynamic team at DUDANT."

job_description:
Responsibilities: Before applying, be sure to carefully read the following:

Our main goal at HealthOS company is to deliver our products to our esteemed customers with great care.

Job Description:

1. Understand the products correctly according to the correct invoice from the supervisor.
2. After understanding the product correctly, arrange the product in the designated place.
3. After the product is ordered, pack the correct product by checking the invoice.

Work Hours:
Morning Shift: From 6 am to 4 pm.

Educational Qualification: Minimum from JSC to SSC, primarily the ability to understand the product names for packaging is the main focus.

Requirements: The location of the workplace is the fourth floor of the Prime Bank building, just ahead of Adabar Police Station, Baiytul Aman Tower.

company_address: Plot No: 67, Road No: 10 Uttara, Dhaka
job_description:
Responsibilities: Akidah Electro Mart is seeking dynamic, customer-oriented, and driven Showroom Salesmen who can confidently engage with customers, understand their requirements, and promote a diverse range of electronic home appliances such as TVs, air conditioners, fans, lights, refrigerators, washing machines, microwave ovens, and other electronics.

The ideal candidate should possess excellent communication skills, product knowledge, and the ability to convert potential customers into actual buyers while delivering exceptional customer service.

Responsibilities include:
- Greeting and assisting customers professionally in the showroom.
- Identifying customer needs and suggesting suitable electronic products.
- Demonstrating product features, advantages, and usage.
- Maintaining comprehensive knowledge of all showroom products.
- Meeting monthly sales targets set by management.
- Ensuring products are displayed neatly and attractively.
- Regularly inspecting and maintaining product cleanliness and functionality for demonstrations.
- Managing stock information and updating inventory records.
- Handling customer inquiries, complaints, and post-sales support with courtesy.

Akidah Electro Mart is looking for energetic, customer-friendly, and motivated Showroom Salesmen who can confidently handle customers, understand their needs, and promote a wide range of electronic home appliances, including TV, AC, Fan, Light, Refrigerator, Washing Machine, Microwave Oven, and other electronics. The candidate should have strong communication skills, product knowledge, and the ability to convert visitors into buyers while ensuring excellent customer service. Welcome and approach customers professionally inside the showroom. Understand customer needs and recommend appropriate electronics products. Demonstrate product features, benefits, and usage. Maintain in-depth knowledge of all showroom products (TV, AC, Fan, Light, Washing Machine, Oven, etc.). Achieve monthly sales targets assigned by the management. Ensure products are displayed neatly and attractively. Regularly check and keep products clean, functional, and ready for demonstration. Maintain proper stock information and update inventory records. Handle customer inquiries, complaints, and after-sales support courteously.

company_address: HealthOS Ltd, Khan ABC Tradeplex, Road-02, Dhanmondi, Dhaka, 1205, Dhaka, Bangladesh
job_description:
Responsibilities: We are looking for a Delivery & Operations Trainer who will collaborate directly with the Operations team to train delivery staff on app usage, operational procedures, and sales generation. This position also involves working closely with internal teams like Returns and Distribution to ensure a seamless end-to-end delivery and service experience for pharmacy partners.

Key Responsibilities:

- Provide training to delivery staff on the Healthos mobile application, covering order management, delivery confirmation, returns, and issue reporting.
- Educate delivery personnel on the entire operational workflow from order collection to delivery, returns, and distribution handover.
- Coordinate effectively with Returns, Distribution, and Operations teams to ensure smooth process execution and clear communication.
- Train and mentor delivery staff on professional communication and building relationships with pharmacy owners.
- Empower delivery staff to drive sales, promote repeat orders, and onboard pharmacies to place orders through the app.
- Conduct onboarding and refresher training sessions for delivery personnel.
- Monitor field performance, identify areas for improvement, and provide feedback to enhance efficiency and sales performance.
- Assist Operations in enhancing service quality and minimizing delivery or process-related issues.

We are seeking a Delivery & Operations Trainer who will work directly with the Operations team to train delivery personnel on app usage, operational processes, and sales generation. This role also requires close coordination with internal teams such as Returns and Distribution to ensure a smooth end-to-end delivery and service experience for pharmacy partners. Key Responsibilities Train delivery personnel on the Healthos mobile application, including order handling, delivery confirmation, returns, and issue reporting. Educate delivery staff on the complete operational workflow from order pickup, delivery, returns, and distribution handover. Coordinate closely with Returns, Distribution, and Operations teams to ensure smooth process execution and clear communication. Train and guide delivery personnel on professional communication and relationship-building with pharmacy owners. Enable delivery staff to generate sales, encourage repeat orders, and onboard pharmacies to place orders through the app. Conduct onboarding and refresher training sessions for delivery personnel. Monitor field performance, identify gaps, and provide feedback to improve efficiency and sales output. Support Operations in improving service quality and reducing delivery or process-related issues.

job_description:
Responsibilities: One of the country's largest electronics companies, Minister-Maywan Group, is hiring a large number of people for the position of Sales Officer in their sales and marketing department.

- Ensure effective numerical distribution in designated areas and recruit new sub-dealers.
- Identify and explore new market opportunities for the company's products.
- Regularly provide products to dealers and sub-dealers and ensure timely collection of payments.
- Maintain product visibility and conduct promotional activities in designated areas.
- Maintain regular communication and strong relationships with dealers and other business partners.
- Fulfill responsibilities with a proactive attitude and commitment in accordance with the company's directions.
- Submit reports to supervisors on time and take proactive steps to solve problems.

Salary and Benefits:
- Attractive salary, TA and DA, festival allowance
- Commission, incentive bonus
- Other benefits as per company policy
- Opportunity for promotion based on annual salary review and performance.

Requirements: Age 20 to 28 years тЬЕ Must be 5 feet 4 inches tall. тЬЕ Must have an interest in selling electronics products. тЬЕ Must maintain physical and mental health. тЬЕ Must have the mentality to work in any district. тЬЕ No prior experience is required. тЬЕ Must have own motorcycle, separate allowance for motorcycle.

job_description:
Responsibilities: In the areas of Jatrabari, Hazaribagh, Dhalibari (Vatara), Fakirbadi, and Bonani (Chairman Bari), there are vacancies.

Salary:
Company biker: 10,846 - 18,446 BDT (Driving license required)
Fuel cost: 210 BDT

Delivery Bonus:
For each delivery from 18 to 24, a bonus of 10 BDT is given.
After 24, a bonus of 15 BDT is given for all deliveries.

Facilities Available:
Every 3 days off, 8 days off per month.
Shifts at 7 am, 9 am, and 10:45 am. 12-hour duty.

Other Facilities:
Salary increment after six months.
Festival allowance given twice a year.
14 days sick leave per year after six months.
11 days festival leave per year after six months.
12 days leave for the wage earner per year after six months.
10 days casual leave per year after six months.

Required Documents:
5 copies of passport-sized photos.
1 copy of national identity card.
1 copy of bio-data (CV).
Photo copy of a nominee's national identity card.
Valid driving license (only for the biker post).
Citizenship certificate (only if birth registration is submitted).
1 copy of nominee's photo.
Contact: 01401153402 (Whatsapp)

Requirements: Terms and Conditions: It is mandatory to have a valid driving license for the company bike post. Age must be at least 21 years as per the NID card.

job_title: Junior Data Analyst (Night Shift - Work From Home)
job_description:
Responsibilities: Future Cloud Bangladesh Limited (FCBL) is a reputable multinational ITES company that has been in operation for over 11 years. We are pleased to offer full-time job opportunities for potential candidates who are willing to work night shifts. Only female applicants are encouraged to apply for this position, and female staff members have the flexibility to work from home.

Responsibilities and key learning areas:
- Conducting extensive online research on North American businesses and their corporate practices.
- Hosting regular meetings with managers, taking notes, and preparing meeting minutes.
- Organizing data in spreadsheets, PowerPoint presentations, etc.
- Making telemarketing calls and hosting conference calls as required.
- Updating CRM systems, adding notes, and assigning drip plans for texts and emails.
- Maintaining internal communication and completing individual assignments.
- Maintaining external communication with corporate stakeholders.
- Participating in collaboration meetings, workshops with industry colleagues, BASIS, etc.
- Updating daily activities and work status in a dedicated individual tracking platform.

Educational Requirements:
- Bachelor's/Master's students from any UGC approved University/College.
- Diploma students currently enrolled are also encouraged to apply.
- Applicants from any discipline/department are welcome, as all will be treated equally.

Compensation & Other Information:
- Work From Home
- 6 days per week.
- Office Schedule (Night Shift)
- On-time salary.
- 10 paid holidays per year.
- 15 casual paid leaves per year.
- All employees have access to loan facilities, including probationary employees.
- Employees, their parents, spouses, and children receive a 35% discount at Ibn Sina Hospital.

Requirements: Additional Requirements
- Age 18 to 32 years
- Only females are allowed to apply.
- Call center experience will get priority.
- English medium background will get priority.
- Must be fluent in English.
- Experience in sales campaigns will get priority.

- Serving North American clients/customers.
- Working as a remote/virtual executive for various overseas companies.
- Back office support (administrative, cold calling, customer service, CRM, etc.)
- Maintaining communication over the phone, email, and chat.
- Managing appointments, rescheduling, and hosting conference calls.
- Coordinating with the team members to ensure the success of the project.
- Statistical analysis and daily reporting to the supervisor.

- Full-time

Job Location:

- On-time salary
- Monthly recreation based on performance.
- Yearly recreation based on performance.

- All employees get loan facilities, including probationary employees.
- Employees and their parents, spouses & children get a 35% discount in Ibn Sina Hospital.
- Company sponsored 3 annual programs.

- Go to https://online-voice-recorder.com and record your voice for at least 2-3 minutes with an introduction on yourself (you can speak about yourself, your education, experience, expertise, family, friends, hobbies, etc.). The recording of your introduction needs to be in English. Save the audio file. You can use any other audio recording software too.
- Send an email to apply@futurecloudbd.com with an attachment of your resume and the audio recording. Keep in mind the voice recording is to verify you are fluent in speaking English, so give your best try in that audio.

Responsibilities: Future Cloud Bangladesh Limited (FCBL) is a reputed multinational ITES company operating for over 11 years. We are pleased to offer full-time job opportunities for potential candidates willing to work at night shift. Males are encouraged to apply for the same position. FCBL has an amazing workplace at the heart of the town, Banani, for male staff.

Job Responsibilities
- Serving North American clients/customers.
- Working as a remote/virtual executive for various overseas companies.
- Back office support (administrative, cold calling, customer service, CRM, etc.)
- Maintaining communication over the phone, email, and chat.
- Managing appointments, rescheduling, and hosting conference calls.
- Coordinating with the team members to ensure the success of the project.
- Statistical analysis and daily reporting to the supervisor.

Employment Status
- Full-time

Job Location
- Dhaka

Compensation & other benefits
- On-time salary
- Monthly recreation based on performance.
- Yearly recreation based on performance.
- Unlimited NESCAF├Й.
- Yearly 10 paid holidays.
- Yearly 15 casual paid leaves.
- All employees get loan facilities, including probationary employees.
- Employees, their parents, spouses & children get a 35% discount in Ibn Sina Hospital.
- Company sponsored 3 Annual programs.

Read Before Apply
- Go to https://online-voice-recorder.com and record your voice for at least 2-3 minutes with an introduction on yourself (you can speak about yourself, your education, experience, expertise, family, friends, hobbies & etc). The recording of your introduction must need to be in English. Save the audio file. You can use any other audio recording software too.
- Send an email to apply@futurecloudbd.com with an attachment of your resume and the audio recording. Keep in mind the voice recording is to verify you are fluent in speaking English, so give your best try in that audio.

Requirements: Educational Requirements
- Fresh graduates and last-semester students can apply.
- Educational requirements can be relaxed if there is over 1 year of experience in a BPO/international call center.

Additional Requirements
- Age 20 to 32 years
- Only Males are allowed to apply.
- Call centre experience will get priority.
- English medium background will get priority.
- Must be fluent in English.
- Experience in sales campaigns will get priority.

company_address: HealthOS Ltd, Khan ABC Tradeplex, Road-02, Dhanmondi, Dhaka, 1205, Dhaka, Bangladesh
job_description:
Responsibilities: HealthOS is looking for a dependable and organized Junior Admin Officer to support the organizationтАЩs daily administrative activities. This role is designed for individuals who can assist in core admin functions including documentation, vendor coordination, asset tracking, and event logistics тАФ all under the supervision of the Admin Officer. The Junior Admin Officer is expected to follow instructions precisely, work with integrity, and ensure smooth administrative execution across both office and operational touchpoints.

Key Responsibilities

- Supplies & Stationery Support:
Assist in tracking office supplies and initiating restocking requests when needed.

- Asset Documentation:
Maintain records of company equipment and infrastructure, ensuring updates are accurate and timely.

- Bill & Utility Tracking:
Monitor rent, electricity, internet, and other utility bills to ensure timely processing and documentation.

- Compliance Document Preparation:
Help gather and prepare necessary paperwork for legal and operational licenses (e.g., trade license, fire safety).

- Vendor Communication:
Liaise with cleaning, maintenance, and service vendors, ensuring work is completed as instructed by the Admin Officer.

- Event Support:
Provide logistical assistance in organizing internal meetings, training sessions, and team events.

- Filing & Records Management:
Maintain organized digital and physical files for all bills, contracts, and administrative documents.

- Data Entry & Report Assistance:
Input data into administrative spreadsheets and assist in compiling reports using Google Docs/Sheets.

Career Path
This is an entry-level administrative position offering valuable hands-on experience in organizational operations, with the potential to grow into a mid-level role based on performance and dedication.

Operational Context
At HealthOS, the Junior Admin Officer plays a supportive administrative role under the direct supervision of the Admin Officer. This position is ideal for individuals early in their administrative career, and includes both desk-based tasks and occasional field responsibilities. The Junior Admin Officer helps manage documentation, vendor follow-up, asset tracking, and event logistics. Precision, honesty, and reliability are critical to success in this role.

Responsibilities: Responsibilities

- Welcome incoming customers to the showroom in a friendly manner.
- Understand customer needs and provide appropriate product advice.
- Explain product features, prices, and offers in detail.
- Stay focused on achieving sales targets.
- Assist in billing, product transfers, and customer service.
- Maintain product display, stock, and showroom cleanliness.
- Handle customer complaints or queries politely.
- Contribute to sales activities through teamwork.
- Have a mindset to work on shifts and holidays as needed.

Responsibilities: Job Responsibilities:
Assistant needed at a coffee house (male/female)
1) A male or female is needed for the position of assistant at a coffee shop. Must be able to write and read. Interest in coffee and drinks preparation, light snacks preparation, receiving and sending frozen items for delivery, and being eager to learn about online page management is required. Previous experience is preferred and willingness to learn the job is necessary.
2) Salary will be determined based on discussion, ranging from TK. 8,000 to 12,000.
3) A commitment to work for at least two years is required.
4) Free accommodation for males.
5) Applicants must be between 18 to 40 years old.
6) Working hours from 11 am to 11 pm.
7) Location: Shanirakhra, Jatrabari, Dhaka.

Salary
TK. 8,000~12,000
Application must be done online. Phone calls will not be accepted.

Responsibilities: Need to handle incoming calls from potential customers related to the Client's business. Collect and review all relevant information to evaluate the validity of complaints and determine potential causes. Regularly report to the team leader regarding complex issues.

Need to handle incoming calls to the prospective customers pertaining to the Client`s business. job_title: Call Center Executive Cum Facebook Moderator
job_description:
Responsibilities: ***Priority will be given to the residents of Moghbazar, Eskaton, and Banglamotor area*** * Receiving and managing inbound and outbound calls. * Providing information related to vehicle to customers and answering queries. * Making follow-up calls to interested customers. * Listening to customer complaints and providing solutions with patience. * Promptly replying to customer messages in the Facebook Page inbox. * Monitoring comments and replying or moderating as necessary. * Filtering out spam and inappropriate comments for removal/hiding. * Creating Facebook Engagement reports. * Understanding customer interests and demands to make proposals.

Requirements: * Must be from the area of Mogbazar or its surroundings.
* Must have at least 1 year of practical experience in call center and Facebook page moderation.
* Priority will be given to those with experience in Genex Infosys / Digicon Technology Ltd.
* Running students need not apply, must work in two shifts (mandatory).
* Must work in the office - not work from home.
* Must have a smart, polite, and humble demeanor, and avoid regionalism while speaking.
* Must have the mentality to speak with patience and interest with customers, giving importance to the customer's statements and providing solutions beautifully.
* Must be skilled in problem-solving.
* Will receive 1000 taka for snacks every month.
* Opportunity for good incentives outside of salary.
* 4 days off per month and opportunity for overtime.
* Working hours: 9 am to 7 pm, 12 pm to 10 pm.
* Educational qualification: Minimum HSC.
* Age: 22 to 27 years.

Responsibilities: Company Name: I-Con Petroleum Corporation BD Brand: I-Con Lubricant Title: Area Sales Manager (A.S.M) Work Area: Area Sales Managers (A.S.M) will be recruited from each district of Khulna, Chittagong, Rajshahi, and Rangpur divisions. Number of Positions: 20 Job Type: Full-time Responsibilities Regularly visit lubricant retailers, service centers, and potential customers to provide detailed information about the brand Recruit new dealers in designated areas and expand the dealer network Ensure achievement of company's sales targets Collaborate with dealers' sales personnel to increase sales Maintain good relationships with dealers and ensure regular product orders Manage market expansion activities of I-Con Lubricant in designated areas Work responsibly following company policies and guidelines Qualifications and Experience Educational Qualification: Degree/Honors or equivalent Age Range: 25 - 35 years Minimum 3-5 years of practical experience in sales and marketing is required Prior experience of at least 1 year in a lubricant company will be given preference Fresh candidates need not apply Leadership qualities, effective communication skills, and goal-oriented work mentality are necessary Salary and Benefits Salary negotiable If working diligently following company rules and regulations, a monthly earning opportunity of 30,000 - 50,000 BDT is available Career advancement opportunities based on performance Workplace Opportunity to work in the field based on respective upazilas/districts Office Location Savar Bus Stand, Savar, Dhaka Contact For inquiries, contact via WhatsApp: 01901-463326
